headline: Here's the 1 Stock Warren Buffett Has Bought in 10 of the Last 13 Quarters -- and Why He'll Likely Keep Buying More
summary: Which stock has Warren Buffett bought more than any other in recent years?  The answer is clearly Berkshire Hathaway.  The conglomerate has spent billions of dollars on stock buybacks initiated by Buffett.
